name: SR-CTF Platform
body:
### Welcome to SR-CTF
This project is being sponsored by the `NSF` with the goal of enhancing and broadening computer security education through the development of `Stepwise` and `Reusable` CTF challenges that emphasize problem solving.

#### Stepwise
A user's skillset should grow as they progress from one challenge to the next. That growth should be relied upon for later challenges. A natural progression from challenge to challenge should be evident.

#### Reusable
Each challenge should be tunable such that unique variants can be generated with minimal effort.

### Sponsored by
![NSF](https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/83610990/nsf1.jpg =40*40)

### Support or Contact
For more information, please contact @nsslab-yin or send email to yin@cs.uga.edu, weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
